member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.DoesRequireFixedSize
member.summary: Determines if the metadata handler requires a fixed size.
member.param: Pointer that receives TRUE if a fixed size is required; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.DoesRequireFullStream
member.summary: Determines if the handler requires a full stream.
member.param: Pointer that receives TRUE if a full stream is required; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.DoesSupportPadding
member.summary: Determines if the metadata handler supports padding.
member.param: Pointer that receives TRUE if padding is supported; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.GetContainerFormats
member.summary: Retrieves the container formats supported by the metadata handler.
member.param: The size of the pguidContainerFormats array.
Pointer to an array that receives the container formats supported by the metadata handler.

param.name: pcchActual
param.para: The actual number of GUIDs added to the array.
To obtain the number of supported container formats, pass NULL to pguidContainerFormats.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.GetDeviceManufacturer
member.summary: Retrieves the device manufacturer of the metadata handler.
member.param: The size of the wzDeviceManufacturer buffer.
Pointer to the buffer that receives the name of the device manufacturer.
The actual string buffer length needed to obtain the entire name of the device manufacturer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.GetDeviceModels
member.summary: Retrieves the device models that support the metadata handler.
member.param: The length of the wzDeviceModels buffer.
Pointer that receives the device models supported by the metadata handler.
The actual length needed to retrieve the device models.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo.GetMetadataFormat
member.summary: Retrieves the metadata format of the metadata handler.
member.param: Pointer that receives the metadata format GUID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataHandlerInfo
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide basic information about the registered metadata handler.
